mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BRAND_CHAT_MESSAGE(ROOM_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, CHAT_MESSAGE, CHAT_DATE) VALUES(#{room_no}, #{member_email}, #{chat_message}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT T2.CHAT_NO ,T2.CHAT_MESSAGE, T2.ROOM_NO, T2.MEMBER_EMAIL, T2.CHAT_DATE, T1.BRAND, T3.MEMBER_NAME, T3.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM BRAND_CHAT_ROOM T1, BRAND_CHAT_MESSAGE T2, MEMBER T3 WHERE T1.ROOM_NO = T2.ROOM_NO AND T2.MEMBER_EMAIL = T3.MEMBER_EMAIL AND T1.ROOM_NO = #{room_no} ORDER BY T2.CHAT_NO ASC

UPDATE BRAND_CHAT_ROOM SET member_count = member_count-1 WHERE room_no = #{room_no}
